title: Traditions of Edinburgh.
author: Chambers, Robert
snippet: A former minister of Cranshaws having wooed a lass of humble rank, the father of the lady, when consulted on the subject, said, ' Tak' him, Jenny ; he's as gude deid as living ! ' meaning of course that she would be as well off as a widow, aj in the quality of a wife.

title: Traditions of Edinburgh.
author: Chambers, Robert
snippet: Such was the case of Cranshaws,  a pastoral parish among the Lammermoor hills.
